verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] , [ARGM-LOC: in an attack on the media] , [V: claimed] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [ARG1: that an aide who gave an official press briefing to dozens of reporters was not real] . It was a new level of brazenness for the already lie - prone president .

President Trump , in an attack on the media , claimed on Saturday that [ARG0: an aide] [R-ARG0: who] [V: gave] [ARG1: an official press briefing] [ARG2: to dozens of reporters] was not real . It was a new level of brazenness for the already lie - prone president .

President Trump , in an attack on the media , claimed on Saturday that [ARG1: an aide who gave an official press briefing to dozens of reporters] [V: was] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: real] . It was a new level of brazenness for the already lie - prone president .
